summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PioSwap DEX clone. All major features working correctly: Home page, Swap page with trade chart, Pools page with Create Pool functionality, Explore page with token filtering, and navigation between pages.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

action_items: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components to fix accessibility warnings
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for key interactive elements
Token filtering on Explore page correctly shows only tokens with active pools
Create Pool functionality works end-to-end with token selection, fee tier selection, and liquidity input
test_credentials: No credentials required - app works in demo mode
seed_data_creation: Created PETH/PGOLD pool during testing with 100 PETH and 50 PGOLD initial liquidity
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Key data-testid attributes: create-pool-btn, create-pool-modal, select-token0-btn, select-token1-btn, amount0-input, amount1-input, submit-create-pool-btn. Token selection in Create Pool modal requires using force=True for clicks due to dialog overlay. The entire backend is MOCKED - no real blockchain transactions occur.

home_page.details: Hero section, Start Trading button, Explore Tokens button, stats section, token ticker, footer all working

swap_page.details: Token selection, amount input, trade chart, recent trades table, Connect Wallet button, Swap/Limit tabs all working

pools_page.details: Pool list with TVL/Volume/APR, New Position button, search functionality, All Pools/My Positions tabs, stats cards all working

create_pool_modal.details: Token selection (both tokens), fee tier selection (4 options), initial liquidity inputs, Create Pool submission all working

explore_page.details: Token list (filtered to only show tokens with active pools), Pools tab, search functionality, Trending section, Trade buttons all working

navigation.details: Navigation between Home, Swap, Pools, Explore pages working correctly

connect_wallet.details: Connect Wallet modal shows 3 wallet options: PioGold Wallet, WalletConnect, Coinbase Wallet

mocked_api_note: MOCKED: The entire backend is a simulation - no real blockchain transactions occur. All pool/token/swap data comes from MongoDB mock data.
